interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Winky Lux Double Matte Whip 24-Hour Waterproof Lipstick, Liquid Wet Lipstick for Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color, Hydrating Makeup with Vanilla and Avocado Oil to Lock in Moisture, 0.14 Oz, Cookie Review Date: 2020/07/07 Store: Winky Lux Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Color': 'Cookie', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.65 x 0.65 x 4.28 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '859346006968'} Review Text: If you have dry lips and you'd like still like to find a liquid lipstick that doesn't crack on your lips I'm afraid this isn't it. It dries out very quickly and it settles in my lines.
The shade of it is nice, I can imagine it looking beautiful on someone with deeper skin tone, I have brown skin but on me it looks unflattering. It does have a soft, non irritating scent which I like. Review Title: Not for me unfortunately! Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Beast Blue Beard Oil with Organic Argan & Jojoba Oils, 1 fl oz Tame the Beast {'Liquid Volume': '1 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Tame the Beast', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1 FL OZ', 'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 3.54 x 1.54 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '817662018546'} Out of all the beard oils the husband has used he says this one is the best. Its lightweight, moisturizing and the scent (which is excellent on its own) doesn't linger too long. I've tried other products from this line and they've all been great! 5/5 4 Pieces Glass Nail Shiner Crystal Nail Shine Buffer Polisher Crystal Glass Nano Nail File with Case for Natural Nails (Black Flat End) Mudder {'Material': 'Glass', 'Brand': 'Mudder', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 0.63 inches; 2.4 Ounces'} I don't understand the good reviews. This didn't work for me. It was uncomfortable to use and didn't do a good job. I feel like it did more damage than good. There's scratches on my nails, even if you use a lighter hand you don't see any results. Not for me. Winky Lux Double Matte Whip 24-Hour Waterproof Lipstick, Liquid Wet Lipstick for Long-Lasting Matte Lip Color, Hydrating Makeup with Vanilla and Avocado Oil to Lock in Moisture, 0.14 Oz, Cookie Winky Lux {'Brand': 'Winky Lux', 'Color': 'Cookie', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.65 x 0.65 x 4.28 inches; 0.14 Ounces', 'UPC': '859346006968'} If you have dry lips and you'd like still like to find a liquid lipstick that doesn't crack on your lips I'm afraid this isn't it. It dries out very quickly and it settles in my lines.
The shade of it is nice, I can imagine it looking beautiful on someone with deeper skin tone, I have brown skin but on me it looks unflattering. It does have a soft, non irritating scent which I like. Not for me unfortunately!
profile:
**User Profile Summary (Updated):**

- **Grooming Products:** The user maintains a strong preference for high-quality grooming solutions, particularly focusing on effective, lightweight, and moisturizing formulations with subtle fragrances. Their established trust in brands that deliver consistent quality remains evident, yet recent experiences suggest a broader scrutiny of products beyond their usual grooming routines.

- **Feedback and Ratings:** The user continues to be discerning in their evaluations, providing high ratings for products that align with their expectations. However, they have also expressed dissatisfaction with a recent nail care product, revealing a willingness to articulate disappointment. Their latest purchase—a matte liquid lipstick—further reflects this critical approach, as they found it inadequate for dry lips despite appreciating its scent and color appeal on deeper skin tones.

- **Purchase Intent:** The user actively seeks products that provide a pleasant experience, are easy to use, and perform effectively, with a focus on non-overpowering scents. Their recent interactions indicate a continued commitment to premium quality, but also a growing vigilance in assessing product performance across various categories, including those outside their primary grooming interests.

Overall, the user demonstrates an evolving perspective on product evaluation, balancing their preference for high-quality grooming experiences with a more critical outlook on efficacy and user satisfaction in their recent purchases.
